 
{{Client function}}
{{New items|3.0140|1.4|
Creates an [[/Element/Effect.md|effect]] on specified position.
}}
{{Note|Not all effects support rotation (e.g. the "fire" - effect doesn't).}}
==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua"> )</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/Effect.md|Effect]]}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''name:''' A string contains [[/Element/Effect#Effects_list.md|effect name]].
*'''x:''' A floating point number representing the X coordinate on the map.
*'''y:''' A floating point number representing the Y coordinate on the map.
*'''z:''' A floating point number representing the Z coordinate on the map.

===Optional Arguments=== 
{{OptionalArg}} 
*'''rX:''' A floating point number representing the rotation about the X axis in degrees.
*'''rY:''' A floating point number representing the rotation about the Y axis in degrees.
*'''rZ:''' A floating point number representing the rotation about the Z axis in degrees.
{{New items|3.06892|1.4|
*'''drawDistance:''' A floating point number between 1 and 8191 which represents the draw distance of the effect, or 0 to use the default draw distance.
|6892}}

=== Returns ===
Returns the [[/Element/Effect.md|effect]] element if creation was successful, ''false'' otherwise.

== Example == 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addCommandHandler("effect", 
	function(cmd, name)
		local x, y, z = getElementPosition(localPlayer)
		if createEffect(name, x, y, z) then
			outputChatBox("Effect created!")
		else
			outputChatBox("Bad effect name.")
		end
	end
)
</syntaxhighlight><!--This example synchronize cam flash effect (without this only local player can see this).
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addEventHandler("onClientPlayerWeaponFire", root,
	function(weapon)
		if weapon == 43 and source ~= localPlayer then
			local x, y, z = getPedWeaponMuzzlePosition(source)
			createEffect("camflash", x, y, z)
		end
	end
)
</syntaxhighlight>-->
